policy_spec.description: update no-root-containers to exempt images nginx:latest

suggestions: The Rego code includes redundant checks for 'nginx:latest'. The constraint spec's 'parameters' already define 'exemptImages', so these checks should be removed from the Rego code to avoid inconsistencies and improve maintainability. The Rego code's skip checks are not utilizing the parameters.exemptImages.

runAsNonRoot.description: If set to true, containers must set securityContext.runAsNonRoot to true.

exemptImages.description: List of images to exempt from the no-root-containers policy.
